entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
